long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your new tab page, simplified. Our goal is to focus on productivity and make your new tab page as useful as possible. There are multiple themes included, and many popular search engines! It also tells you the weather. We even have a radio on the 'About' page in Settings.

The source code is publicly available @ https://github.com/AFHStudio/retab.
